title: Teacher Inquiry-Based Professional Learning for Integrating Learning Design and Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science subject knowledge and understanding of primary education methodologies
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen data-driven lesson design and analytical competencies using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can connect learning design elements with analytical metrics to suggest instructional improvement plans.
Learners can perform learning data interpretation and design revision procedures by applying the teacher inquiry process model.
Learners can complete science curriculum designs incorporating learning analytics results through collaboration with peer teachers.

resources: Science Curriculum Standards-Based Learning Design Template

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
